name: Bottomless Potion of Amplification
flavorText: "Some of you claimed I lost the touch during my sojourn in the King's dungeon. To you I say, this potion amplifies healing and puts the lie to your feckless assertions! Yes, I'm back, lackies!" -Royal Apothecary Jentulf in his weekly address to the Society of Apothecaries.
flavorTextHtml: "Some of you claimed I lost the touch during my sojourn in the King's dungeon. To you I say, this potion amplifies healing and puts the lie to your feckless assertions! Yes, I'm back, lackies!" -Royal Apothecary Jentulf in his weekly address to the Society of Apothecaries.

secondary.textHtml: Increases healing from all sources by 22% for 5 seconds. [20 - 25]%
